About me
Hello! I am a PhD student in political science at the University of Maryland.
My research focuses on gender, political parties, and electoral politics in Indonesia.
I study how institutional design and party competition shape womenâ€™s descriptive representation.
My work examines: - gender-based candidate quotas - party competition and fragmentation - descriptive political representation
